title: Public Resource Receives $5 million, 5-year Grant From Arcadia
abstract:
The logos of Arcadia and of Public Resource.  The text for Arcadia reads: "A Chairtable Fund of Lisbet Rausing and Peter Baldwin. For Public Resource, it is the Great Seal of the Seal of Approval and the logo features a grinning seal. 
For Release July 2, 2020 
Public Resource Receives $5 million, 5-year Grant From Arcadia 
Public.Resource.Org (“Public Resource”) is pleased and delighted to announce that we 
have received a $5 million grant from Arcadia, a charitable fund of Lisbet Rausing and P
